column5: Does anyone know of someone that services reels in the Oshawa/Pickering area? I have a Browning that have used for years and is great and light,but needs a little tweaking,the bail does not flip all the way back sometims.probably just needs a new spring,I used some reel oil on it,helped a bit,but not like it should be.Don t want to toss it out, would appreciate you help. Thanks Al
Al, did you contact the guys at Gagnon's?
no do they have some one
I think so, it's worth a call.  If not, try Dave at Hirk's.
I'd like to send off my Calais to get a good cleaning this winter as well.  I'm not a fan of taking apart expensive reels, lol.
You may want to try Rocky's Tackle Service - while I haven't had any reels serviced there, they did an excellent job on my MinnKota.  39 Colborne Street East Orillia, ON L3V 1T4 (705) 325-3526
I'm not a fan of takin' apart inexpensive reels either.
I think Rocky's does all reels but Shimano, had a bunch of Abu Garcia's done a few years ago Richard

you could email or call browning canada for the info  5583 Ch Saint-Francois Saint-Laurent QC, H4S 1W6  Phone #: 514-333-7261 Fax #: 514-333-7845  Key contact: Daniel Legeault , General Manager  Website: www.browning.com Email: [emailÂ protected]
Thanks Terry I called Daniel,he doesn t have parts and knows no one that can help me. Springfield Mo.can't even help out. But i appreciate the info and your help  Al
TRY AIKMANS in MISSISAUGA.          A AIKMAN SPORTING GOODS REPAIR  3010 Novar Rd, Mississauga, ON L5B 1S4 T: 905-277-3595   F: 905-277-0088
Tried them last week and people in Orillia area. thanks al
If Browning can't help you I would say you are.... outta luck...
